website_summaries.verdict: A budget lantern that does exactly what it should — casts enough light for you to see  during power outages, camping trips, and fishing outings.
pros: Dura-Base cylinder holder works with 16.4-ounce propane cylinder (not included)
cons: Goes through propane a little quicker than other lanterns its size, so be sure to bring extra

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy...simple and effective lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lantern. Do not see how people lose the top nut. The top nut on mine is big enough not to lose. The bolt it mounts to is also quality. I purchased a used quick pack coleman lantern as well, and the top nut mounting bolt was so loose, I had to put an additional nut on it to get it tight enough to use. There's something to be said about the simplicity and functionality of this lantern. Just as bright as the Coleman too.
customer_reviews.author: GOOD Game

customer_reviews.title: works great as a hanging lantern, not so well free standing
customer_reviews.text: the lantern itself works ok, I guess. you have to kind of find some way to get the match up inside the glass to light the gas. but the base is completely worthless. it does not hold the cylinder at all. its too bad to cause the flip out feet would make it very stable. in fact, that base isn't going anywhere, it just doesn't hold the cylinder at all. I thought I just had to press it in there further, but looking at it from the bottom, the cylinder is going all the way in. and nope, its not the plastic cylinder base either.
customer_reviews.author: charles a keener

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Cost . Very decent Lantern. 😎
customer_reviews.text: Love this lantern for the money it does just as good as a coleman but for less money 💴. Great Camping tool to have or for emergencies. I recommend this lantern. Gives off plenty of light for your camp ⛺️
customer_reviews.author: Jimnic26

customer_reviews.title: Good propane lanter
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for power outages here at home, and decided to buy another for a family member because they work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Still falls over. Rest works ok. Feet extensions could work better. or be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Home hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great latern for the money
customer_reviews.text: This lantern replaced a 20 year old Coleman. Based on the reviews went with this one, for the money it is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Tami Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We took this camping and I have to say I am impressed. Lots of light and good brightness control. I transported it in a basket with other items in an enclosed trailer. It made it to the camp site and back home in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lantern!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern! I have a Coleman 2 mantle also, and I would have to say, I prefer this one. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Weber

customer_reviews.title: Well made - very bright
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made - the valve is much better than another brand I had. I use it atop a distribution tree for emergency backup for power outages. I also got the metal screen globe for outdoor use as the glass globe is vulnerable to breakage in an outdoor (camping) scenario. As with any propane accessory, be careful with threading.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badinov

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on a better lantern
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy design and leaks gas when connecting to propane tank which is a pretty concerning defect. Went with the Coleman elite 5177 and I’m much happier with its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We use them here at the lakes and sell a few to new campers for not much more than what we paid. Much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Base is too big for propane tank
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it ONE time camping... the glass is now all burnt black and to top it off the base is to big to safely secure the propane tank so I had to hang it and couldn’t use the base
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly fine, brand new and all
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly fine, brand new and all. wish the top screw wasn't so small because we lost it 10 minutes after assembling it. other than that, it is perfect and sold at a better price than other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what we needed. We had tried a similar product from Wal-Mart and this product was superior by far-bright and reliable. Just what we needed for our camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second fishing lantern and it is just as good as the Coleman's version of the same type. It does go through propane a little faster than the Coleman lantern but it is just about as bright. This lantern cools down faster than a coleman propane lantern which I was pleasantly surprised, which makes it nice to pack away after a long night of fishing. I just wish that i would have ordered a couple extra ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Used both lanterns for 4 hours, both worked well ...
customer_reviews.text: Used both lanterns for 4 hours, both worked well until one of the lantern glass dome cracked from the heat. It was slightly brown on both sides of the glass where the mantel were and one side cracked. The other lantern has the same brown marks but it didn't crack "YET".
customer_reviews.author: amos

customer_reviews.title: this lantern works great throws off a lot of light and will light ...
customer_reviews.text: this lantern works great throws off a lot of light and will light up our campsite and backyard for years to come, just wish they made a case to store it in
customer_reviews.author: robin w

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome lantern for the money !! works fine can fish all night !!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: AND THEN THERE WAS LIGHT!!
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE FREQUENT POWER OUTAGES. THIS ALLOWS ME TO ENJOY READING WHILE OTHERS ARE SCRAMBLING TO JUST SEE.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Evenson

customer_reviews.title: It works but without the case i don't see it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but without the case i don't see it lasting that long. I think I would spend the extra money for a case now that I have this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had more expensive lanterns and this works as well as any. Will keep you posted on durability.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Kind bright
customer_reviews.text: Bright but not as bright as liquid propane don't light indoors ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a little more dim than I expected actually. But, it was pretty cheap and it works well. I'm using it on a propane tank tree.
customer_reviews.author: Alb

customer_reviews.title: Worked great all summer
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the competitors and works just as well. Worked great all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Streaming_Vader

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice low end lantern. Well made and a good value
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fitch

customer_reviews.title: i broke the glass first day of arrival, where ...
customer_reviews.text: i broke the glass first day of arrival ,where to buy a replacement ,has to be #167 replacement globe ,#170 and 171 doesnt fit its the glass too small
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This product is just OK. I like the wide solid base, but the silk mantles that came with it were crumpled and did not take shape properly when initially burned as they were supposed to do. I also miss having a sparking device for lighting the lantern. Would have paid more had I known there was no spark/igniter.
customer_reviews.author: AGB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Lanterns are nice for the money, have had no problem. like the base
customer_reviews.author: Farris

customer_reviews.title: Super bright !
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with out Stansport propane tree! Lit our whole primitive campsite - on low! Foolishly, we didn't take care with the glass globe and we broke it...but, we're so pleased with this lantern that we ordered another and the metal mesh globe replacement! Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: 8Legs & 24paws

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If you get two trips out of this lantern before the glass breaks you're ahead of the curve.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Excited to get this lantern today, until I went to assemble the hanger. The manufacturer only drilled one hole in the lantern top when two are needed to install the hanger. I am capable of correcting this issue, but it makes me question the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The next storm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lantern in preparation for the next major storm. I'll let you know how it performs after the next major storm of the century.
customer_reviews.author: rfid

product_meta.title: Stansport 2 Mantle Propane Lantern
feature_bullets: Vented hood with durable baked on enamel finish
On/Off control knob and built in pressure regulator, adjusts to 600 candle power
Dura Base with tip-resistant feet which holds a 16. 4 oz disposable propane gas cylinder (NOT INCLUDED)
Steel carrying/hanging handle and 2 silk mantles included

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
